testcase.name: Select 'In person' in "Present document" section
Scan QR-code or tap for NFC with reader device and display presentation request
Cancel data sharing process
Proceed with data sharing flow
Enter PIN to proceed with data sharing
Return to "Home" screen after successful data sharing
User selects the option ‘Online’ in the “Present document” section
Wallet opens the scanner to scan QR-code
Wallet displays the presentation request
User cancels the data sharing process
User proceeds with the data sharing flow
User enters the PIN to proceed with data sharing
Wallet displays a success screen after data sharing
User closes the success screen
